name: UTXO Global
description: UTXO Global is a DeFi-focused wallet on the Nervos Network (CKB), designed for managing assets on UTXO-based blockchains. It integrates with the RGB++ protocol to enable seamless management and trading of digital assets, such as meme tokens. As the first wallet integrated into Telegram and available as a Chrome extension, it offers batch transfers, cross-platform synchronization, and CKB.Fi integration for minting and trading RGB++ tokens from social content, driving DeFi innovation in the UTXO ecosystem.

highlights.title: First Telegram-Integrated Wallet
highlights.description: Pioneers DeFi by being the first wallet integrated into Telegram, enabling seamless asset management within a popular messaging platform

highlights.title: Multi-Asset Support
highlights.description: Manages UTXO-compatible assets using Nervos CKB’s Cell model and RGB++ protocol for secure, flexible handling

highlights.title: Chrome Extension Wallet
highlights.description: Available as a Chrome extension, providing a convenient and accessible interface for managing UTXO-based assets directly in the browser

videos.title: UTXO Global Multi-Sig Wallet supporting xUDT

related.title: JoyID
related.desc: A pioneering universal account protocol crafted to accelerate Web3 mass adoption.

faq.a: UTXO Global stands out as the first wallet integrated into Telegram, offering seamless DeFi access within a popular messaging platform. It also operates as a Chrome extension, supports batch transfers, synchronizes across platforms, and integrates with CKB.Fi for minting/trading RGB++ meme tokens, enhancing liquidity and user engagement in the Nervos ecosystem.

Enabling seamless asset management across platforms with cross-platform synchronization. It supports multiple UTXO-compatible assets using CKB’s Cell model and RGB++ protocol, facilitates efficient batch transfers through a multisig wallet, integrates with CKB.Fi for minting and trading RGB++ meme tokens from social content, and enhances cross-chain liquidity for Nervos CKB and Fiber networks.
